title: Drawing, "Bow Pattern, Textile Design", 1950–70
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.
description: On blue background: a pattern of bows in pink, light blue, dark blue and white.

Drawing, "Bow Pattern, Textile Design", 1950–70.
1950–70. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.. Gift of Mr. Donald Cameron. 1992-51-81.
